Posts.Content: Hi had 2nd fec last Wednesday and have felt dizzy and light headed . Bp 105/75 any advice or is it normal thanks
Posts.Title: 2 fec feeling dizzy

Posts.Content: Hi I've had to lots of surgery to get clear margins. Nodes are clear but I am her2+ and er+ any idea what chemo I will be on
Posts.Title: What chemo

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply. Wanted to do some reading before oncologist app. They said chemo but not what sort. So don't know about the test . Apologies for lack of please and thanks on original post. Pressed publish to soon and could edit
Posts.Title: What chemo

Posts.Content: The waiting I feel is the hardest. I've had my surgery and awaiting results and treatment plan on 1dec x all the best x
Posts.Title: How long have you waited to have surgery after chemo?

Posts.Content: I had lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy 12 nov. Had further surgery today as they didn't get clear margins. My lymph nodes were clear, upped from grade 2 now 3. I have IDC, HER2+ ER+. Chemo January followed by radiotherapy herceptin and tamoxifen . Best wishes to you all
Posts.Title: Further surgery after Sentinel Node Biopsy

Posts.Content: Hi I'm on day 11 after 1st fec. A lot of people say day 14 is the hair day. Can anyone tell me if it's sudden when it starts. Thankyou
Posts.Title: Hair Care before and after Chemo

Posts.Content: Find out results from second surgery . Hoping for clear margins, and a chemo start date x her2+ er+ Grade 3 nodes clear. Any advice
Posts.Title: Follow up

Posts.Content: Thanks dreamtheif that's a great deal of info. I get my results on 1st dec and was wondering if they would start treatment before Christmas. X
Posts.Title: Treatment after surgery

Posts.Content: hi . I've had a lumpectomy for invasive ductal carcinoma. Grade 2. HER2+ ER+ what sort of treatments have others received and how soon was it started. Thankyou
Posts.Title: Treatment after surgery

Posts.Content: Thank you I have a supportive family but nothing can help as much as someone who's been there x
Posts.Title: Another newbi

Posts.Content: Thankyou for replies. My tumour is only 2cm. But the consultant said definitely radiotherapy and tamoxifen. As I had her+ chemo was likely as herceptin cannot be given without chemo.this is all so confusing . I am also feeling so guilty as I am struggling to feel positive .
Posts.Title: Another newbi

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I'm new to the group. I have been diagnosed with invasive ductal carcinoma. The biopsy showed Her2+ and Er+ . I am for breast conserving surgery next week. I am finding my emotions all over the place .
Posts.Title: Another newbi

Posts.Content: Hi 2 daughters my pain following lumpectomy on 11 nov has increased since the fluid in breast has decreased. However they didn't get clear margins so more surgery tomorrow x
